component.attributes:
&standard_uicomponent_attributes; &widget_var_attribute;
model false org.primefaces.model.map.MapModel
An org.primefaces.model.map.MapModel instance.
style false java.lang.String Style of the main container of datagrid.
styleClass false java.lang.String Style class of the main container of datagrid.
type true java.lang.String Type of the map.
center true java.lang.String Center point of the map.
zoom true java.lang.Integer 8 Defines zoom level.
onOverlaySelectUpdate false java.lang.String Specifies component(s) to update after ajax overlay selection.
onOverlaySelectStart false java.lang.String Javascript callback to execute when ajax request to overlay selection starts.
onOverlaySelectComplete false java.lang.String Javascript callback to execute when ajax request to overlay selection completes.
overlaySelectListener false javax.el.MethodExpression void overlaySelectListener(org.primefaces.event.map.OverlaySelectEvent) Server side listener to invoke when an overlay is selected with ajax.
stateChangeListener false javax.el.MethodExpression void stateChangeListener(org.primefaces.event.map.StateChangeEvent) Server side listener to invoke when map state is changed.
onStateChangeUpdate false java.lang.String Specifies component(s) to update after map state is changed.
pointSelectListener false javax.el.MethodExpression void pointSelectListener(org.primefaces.event.map.PointSelectEvent) Server side listener to invoke when a point in map is selected.
onPointSelectUpdate false java.lang.String Specifies component(s) to update after when a map point is selected.
markerDragListener false javax.el.MethodExpression void markerDragListener(org.primefaces.event.map.MarkerDragEvent) Server side listener to invoke when a marker is dragged.
onMarkerDragUpdate false java.lang.String Specifies component(s) to update after when a marker is dragged.
streetView false java.lang.Boolean false Enables street view support when set to true.
disableDefaultUI false java.lang.Boolean false Disables default UI controls.
navigationControl false java.lang.Boolean true Defines visibility of navigation control.
mapTypeControl false java.lang.Boolean true Defines visibility of map type control.
draggable false java.lang.Boolean true When set to false, map cannot be dragged.
disableDoubleClickZoom false java.lang.Boolean false Disables zooming on map on double click.
onPointClick false java.lang.String Javascript callback to execute when a point in map is clicked.
